titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Children are America's Greatest Assets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 5/14/1996--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that children are America's greatest assets. Calls upon all U.S. citizens to honor, nurture, and love our children on every day of the year.
